description: The world as we know it has ended. Sickness has taken away millions of people. In the aftermath of looting and violence one group of survivors comes out on top. They hold the resources and power. They will do whatever it takes to stay on top, no matter how high the cost.Blake is coming of age in a time when her society, the City, is at war with gangs of Outsiders. Her leaders, the Priesthood, need all the help they can get. Taken from her home at a young age, she is trained to kill. She lives her life for the City with no other reason to live. Then Anthony becomes her trainer. She learns that not everything is what it seems.Now that she is Outside, in deep with a group of rebels, will she continue to fight for her City, or will she choose a different path? One she was never meant to know existed?
title: The Hand that Feeds
